HFAG
=====

Manual Take Down July 30th, 2015
----------------------------------


* apachectrl cannot find pid, just proceed anyhow
* note tomcat was running too
* Apparently the clock is wrong


::

    [blyth@hfag blyth]$ sudo /sbin/shutdown -h now "goin down"

    Broadcast message from root (pts/0) (Fri Dec  8 20:13:22 2000):

    goin down 
    The system is going down for system halt NOW!
    [blyth@hfag blyth]$
